sentences.en: " Roast raven, " Jon suggested. " And half a pint of ale. "
sentences.cn: “ 烤乌鸦, ” 琼恩建议. “ 还有半品脱淡色啤酒. ”

sentences.en: A raven, grabbed the necklace, and flew off with it.
sentences.cn: 正好有一只乌鸦飞过, 叼起项链飞走了.

sentences.en: After forty days Noah opened a window 7 and sent out a raven.
sentences.cn: 6过了四十天,挪亚开了方舟的窗户,7放出一只乌鸦去.

sentences.en: Amrf ( Raven Form ): Allows to change the flying height of ground units.
sentences.cn: 乌鸦形态 ): 可以让地面单位飞起来并改变其高度.

sentences.en: Bring up a raven and he'll pick out your eyes.
Her charming face was framed with raven hair.
sentences.cn: 她迷人的脸上垂落着乌亮的黑发.

sentences.en: Nourish a raven and he will scratch out your eyes.
sentences.cn: 喂饱的乌鸦,啄你的眼睛.
外面，一只渡鸦尖叫了一声。

sentences.en: Poor Jem! His raven hair, was that too to have its influence against him?
sentences.cn: 可怜的杰姆! 连他那乌黑的头发, 都会叫人对他发生恶感 吗 ?

sentences.en: Raven Navy Issue has had it's description tweaked to display correct bonuses.
sentences.cn: 海军乌鸦的说明被修改了,以正确显示加成.

sentences.en: That was when his poem The Raven was published.
sentences.cn: 那是在他的诗歌《乌鸦》发表以后.

sentences.en: The one I seek has raven hair and lips red as rubies.
sentences.cn: 我要找的那个人,有乌黑的秀发,红宝石的嘴唇.

sentences.en: The symbols of Apollo were the wolf, swan, raven, stag, dolphin, laurel, and lyre.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗的象征物是狼 、 天鹅 、 渡鸦 、 雄鹿 、 海豚 、 桂冠和竖琴.

sentences.en: The violet eyes, Taylor's white skin and raven hair may be captivating on their own, but Etcoff said that it was the combination of them that likely boosted her allure.
sentences.cn: 泰勒蓝紫色的眼睛、白皙的皮肤和乌黑的头发本身就颇为迷人，但是在艾科夫看来，很可能是所有这些的结合，更增添了她的魅力。

sentences.en: We know the raven will never leave the man's room.
sentences.cn: 我们知道了乌鸦再也不会离开男子的房间.

sentences.en: Which waves in every raven tress .
sentences.cn: 美波动在她乌黑的发上。

sentences.en: Why don't we hand ourselves over to Raven and ask him to shoot us?
sentences.cn: 我们何不把自己交给雷文要他射杀我们?

words.tran_cn: 贪婪的；渴望的；狼吞虎咽的

trans.tran_en: raven hair is black and shiny
to seize or seek (plunder, prey, etc)
